name: Tyree LAWSON, Petitioner v. UNKNOWN ACTOR(S) OF The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OFFICE of Clerk of Courts and/or Bail Refund Unit and Bail Commissioners, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Lawson v. Unknown Actor(s) of Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas Office

parties: Tyree LAWSON, Petitioner v. UNKNOWN ACTOR(S) OF The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OFFICE of Clerk of Courts and/or Bail Refund Unit and Bail Commissioners, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of October, 2014, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
101 A.3d 1148
Tyree LAWSON, Petitioner v. UNKNOWN ACTOR(S) OF The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OFFICE of Clerk of Courts and/or Bail Refund Unit and Bail Commissioners, Respondents.
